summary: Mustafa Moradi is aching to find a girlfriend. On the other end of the city, Linnea is desperately searching for a guy with style, courage and a burning passion.
cast: Poyan Karimi|Chanelle Lindell|Oliver Wahlgren-Ingrosso|Mina Azarian|Arash Bolouri|Jan Coster|Stefano Della-Schiava|Maria Hedborg|Lotta Karlge|Hussein Kazem|Krister Kern|Jimmy Lindström|Adam Lundgren|Ali-Reza Modjallal|Shebly Niavarani|Oscar Rydelius|Lisa Sennerby|Camilla Smids|Frederika Tham|Anders Wängdahl|Fortesa Hoti
title: Ciao Bella
